overall_goal: Serving food from a pan into multiple bowls on the kitchen worktop.

clips.subgoal: Setting up the bowls and preparing the pan

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Placing a serving bowl on the worktop
Preparing the pan by removing the lid

clips.subgoal: Serving food from the pan into bowls

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Using a spoon to scoop and serve food into a bowl
Repeating the process of scooping food to serve in multiple bowls
Final adjustments and placing the bowl back on the kitchen worktop

clips.subgoal: Putting the spoon back into the pan

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Putting the spoon in the pan
